column4: hi guys i am trying to install directx 9.0c in ubuntu using wine but i am getting an error "err:setupapi:do_file_copyW Unsupported style(s) 0x144". can anybody help?
hi guys i am trying to install directx 9.0c in ubuntu using wine but i am getting an error "err:setupapi:do_file_copyW Unsupported style(s) 0x144". can anybody help?
don't install native directx in wine. wine has its own implementation, and native breaks more than it fixes
